content: chunky rib hat this hat is both easy to make and stretchy enough to fit most people what you need yarn approximately 75g of any chunky yarn needles 6mm circular needles or dpns sewing needle & scissors pattern cast on 64 stitches and join in the round being careful not to twist your stitches place a marker at the beginning of the round working k2 p2 rib pattern continue until your work measures 12 inches decreasing 1st round *k2tog p2 repeat to the end of the round 48 sts 2nd round *k1 p2tog repeat to the end of the round 32 sts 3rd round k2tog around 16 sts 4th round k2 decrease around 8 sts cut yarn and using the sewing needle thread it through the remaining stitches pull tightly and fasten_off weaving in the end by ann cooke © craftedbyann
